VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {5} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Premium Brands relative to the peak of Budget Shoppers in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Premium Brands is to the {left} of the peak of Budget Shoppers.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Premium Brands show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Premium Brands shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Ethical Consumers} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =73.1?
EVJ.A: At X =73.1,the label with the highest density is {Ethical Consumers}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 28? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {67},{Convenience-Oriented}'s peak at {73},{Budget Shoppers}'s peak at {83}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 70? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {67},{Premium Brands}'s peak at {18},{Organic Shoppers}'s peak at {17}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Ethical Consumers?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Organic Shoppers?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Ethical Consumers or Premium Brands?
NC.A: {Ethical Consumers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Premium Brands?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Ethical Consumers}
